andrzej@... wrote:

> Hi!
> 
> I have a small problem. Due to the fact that I use some AOP techniques, my
> code is mostly generated by AOP weaver. One side-effect is that for all
> test methods the body is moved to private method and this method is called
> from previous test method. 

Do you need to weave aspects into your test code, or just your 
production code? If possible, I recommend weaving aspects /only/ into 
your production code. (This is a general recommendation and not just one 
way to deal with your difficulty.)
